# Api Integrator Command

Learn and integrate new APIs, creating permanent skills for external service access..

## Usage

```
/api-integrator
```

## What It Does

This command invokes the `api-integrator` skill. See the skill documentation for detailed process steps.

## Skill Reference

This command invokes: `@skills/api-integrator`

See `@skills/api-integrator/SKILL.md` for full documentation and `@skills/api-integrator/reference.md` for examples.
